pageContext.claim: “When the Failing @nytimes or Amazon @washingtonpost writes a story saying 'unnamed sources said', or any such phrase where a person’s  name is not used, don’t believe them. Most of these unnamed sources don't exist. They are made up to defame & disparage. They have no 'source'”
pageContext.analysis: Legitimate news organizations do not make up sources or quotes. That's a firing offense. Trump administration officials often ask to conduct briefings with reporters on background, meaning, the administration officials agree to be quoted only as anonymous sources. Trump himself has been an anonymous source to journalists over the years, as he has acknowledged.
